metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19542 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in JasPer 2.0.14. There is a NULL pointer dereference in the function jp2_decode in libjasper/jp2/jp2_dec.c, leading to a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19542` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjasper-runtime - 1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1.3
libjasper1 - 1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jasper package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.900.1-debian1-2.4ubuntu1.3').
